data.title: Terms of Use
meta_keywords: british association for counselling and psychotherapy
data.meta_description: Terms of use and privacy policy for the counsellinghelp web site
data.text:
The content, materials and information contained within the site are solely owned by or licensed by Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons). All rights reserved.

While Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) undertakes reasonable efforts to offer accurate, complete and up-to-date information, the site, including without limitation the content, materials, information and any software, DVD's, CD's, MP3’s or tapes made available through it, is provided to the user "as is" and without warranties or representations of any kind, either express or implied.

The access and use of this site is at the user's own risk. Neither Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) nor any individual counsellors associated with Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) shall be liable to any person in contract, tort, statute or otherwise for any loss distress or damage of any kind (excluding negligence or personal injury caused by Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) which is proved to have been caused as a result of any inaccuracy of the contents of the information or mis-advice contained on this website (unless made fraudulently), nor for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss) arising in contract, tort or otherwise from the use of or inability to use this site, or any material contained in it, or from any action or decision taken as a result of using this site or any such material.

Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) may modify and/or discontinue operation of all or portions of this site at any time at its sole discretion, without notice and assumes no responsibility to update the site.

The materials on this site do not constitute professional advice. If you have a history of mental illness or are currently experiencing any symptoms of mental imbalance, including chronic stress, depression, distress and or anxiety, Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) recommends that you seek immediate professional help from a qualified medical practitioner in your local area before using any of its products.

Hyperlinks to third party sites do not constitute an endorsement by Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) and Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) are not responsible for the availability of these sites or their contents. The linking to these sites is at the user's own risk.

By accessing any part of this site, you shall be deemed to have accepted these terms in full.

Any claims or suits associated with the site or its use shall be governed and constructed in accordance with the laws of England & Wales, excluding its conflicts of law principles.

Content

Permission to use documents, content, logo, images from this site is not granted. No part of the material may be reproduced or transmitted in any form or by any means electronic or mechanical, including photocopying, or by any information storage and retrieval system, without prior written permission from Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons). Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) grants the user the right to use the material by downloading, storing and making copies for private use only. None of the above grants any person the right to copy or substantially include any of the material in a published work, whether consisting in physical, electronic or whatever form, without prior written consent from Mindscape Limited and David Lloyd-Hoare BSc(Hons) Central Office.

(d) information that you provide to us for the purpose of subscribing to my web site services, email notifications and/or newsletters; and

(e) any other information that you choose to send to me.

Cookies

I use cookies on this web site.

A cookie consists of information sent by a web server to a web browser, and stored by the browser. The information is then sent back to the server each time the browser requests a page from the server. This enables the web server to identify and track the web browser.

I may send you cookies which may be stored on by your browser on your computer’s hard drive. I may use the information I obtain from the cookies in the administration of this web site, to improve the web site’s usability and for marketing purposes. I may also use that information to recognise your computer when you visit my web site, and to personalise my web site for you.

Most browsers allow you to refuse to accept cookies. (For example, in Internet Explorer you can refuse all cookies by clicking “Tools”, “Internet Options”, “Privacy”, and selecting “Block all cookies” using the sliding selector.) This will, however, have a negative impact upon the usability of many web sites, including this one.

I use Google Analytics to analyse the use of this web site. Google Analytics generates statistical and other information about web site use by means of cookies, which are stored on users' computers. The information generated relating to my website is used to create reports about the use of the web site. Google will store this information. Google's privacy policy is available at: www.google.com/privacypolicy.html.

Using Personal Data

Personal data submitted on this web site will be used for the purposes specified in this privacy policy or in relevant parts of the web site.

I may use your personal information to:

(a) administer the web site;

(b) improve your browsing experience by personalising the web site;

(c) enable your use of the services available on the web site;

(d) send to you downloads purchased via the web site;

(e) send statements and invoices to you, and collect payments from you if applicable;

(f) send you general (non-marketing) commercial communications concerning our business and not from third parties;

(g) send you email notifications which you have specifically requested;

(h) send to you our newsletter and other marketing communications (relating to our business which we think may be of interest to you by post or, where you have specifically agreed to this, by email or similar technology;

(i) deal with enquiries and complaints made by or about you relating to the web site.

Other Disclosures

In addition to the disclosures reasonably necessary for the purposes identified elsewhere in this privacy policy, I may disclose information about you:

(a) to the extent that I am required to do so by law;

(b) in connection with any legal proceedings or prospective legal proceedings;

(c) in order to establish, exercise or defend my legal rights (including providing information to others for the purposes of fraud prevention and reducing credit risk); and

(d) to the purchaser (or prospective purchaser) of any business or asset which I am (or are contemplating) selling.

Data Security

I will take reasonable technical and organisational precautions to prevent the loss, misuse or alteration of your personal information.

I do not store credit card details nor do I share customer details with any 3rd parties.

Of course, data transmission over the Internet is inherently insecure, and I cannot guarantee the security of data sent over the Internet.

You are responsible for keeping your password and user details confidential. I will not ask you for your password.

Policy Amendments

I may update this privacy policy from time-to-time by posting a new version on my web site. You should check this page occasionally to ensure you are happy with any changes.

Your Rights

You may instruct me to provide you with any personal information I hold about you. Provision of such information may be subject to the payment of a fee (currently fixed at �10.00).

You may instruct me not to process your personal data for marketing purposes by email at any time.

Updating Your Information

Please let me know if the personal information which I hold about you needs to be corrected or updated.

Contact Me

If you have any questions about this privacy policy or my treatment of your personal data, please contact me using the methods detailed on the Contact page of the web site
